job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtAbout UsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtOur mission is to make education accessible and over the last two decades Studycom has become the leading online education platform deliveringampnbspaampnbsppersonalized learning experience across a broad continuum of education for over 30 million students instructors and professionals every monthltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAs a member of the Studycom team youll help empower millions of learners to achieve their education and career goals We focus on increasing access to education because we know information is the ultimate equalizer and that education is key to upward mobility Every minute a learner enrolls in a course and our College Accelerator solution Studycom has collectively saved students 132 million in college tuitionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtYoull also be part of a company dedicated to contributing to society Studycom has donated 23 million inkind value across social impact programs including matching employee contributions to nonprofit organizations and millions to help schools during the pandemicltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAt Studycom we know that strong communities are built on the power of our diversity and we respect and strive to understand for the diverse identities race ethnicities backgrounds and perspectives of our team members And our work and company culture have been consistently recognized includingltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtInc Best Place to WorkltligtltligtFortune Great Places to Work  Best Workplaces in the Bay ArealtligtltligtGolden Bridge Awards  Gold Winner Corporate Social ResponsibilityltligtltligtSan Francisco Business Times ampamp Silicon Valley Business Journal  Best Places to WorkltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAtampnbspStudycom our ltstronggtSoftware Engineersltstronggt help our crossfunctional teams rally around common goals and deliver valuable features frequently  sometimes multiple times a day Our Full Stack Engineers work on the front and backend emphasizing collaboration learning and fast feedback including pair programming and regular constructive code reviews We invest in our engineers growth which reflects and reinforces our mission to make education accessibleltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtCome join us on our mission and make a differenceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtAbout the Software Engineer PositionltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a talented flexible Software Engineer to join one of our crossfunctional teams at StudycomltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe ideal Software Engineer will have experienceampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtDelivering endtoend website features and solutions across the application stack in an iterative mannerampnbspltligtltligtCollaborating on a crossfunctional team to deliver against a product road mapltligtltligtParticipating in brainstormsessions design discussions code reviews and automated test developmentltligtltligtTaking initiative to get questions answered unblock ongoing development and make everyone on your team successfulltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtRequirementsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligt3 years experience doing backend development with Javaltligtltligt3 years experience with frontend web application development using modern HTML CSS and JavaScriptltligtltligtHave experience working with objectoriented design relational databases data structures and multithreaded algorithmsltligtltligtBS or MS in Computer Science or related fieldltligtltligtSelfmotivated detailoriented and strong analytical  problem solving skillsltligtltligtDesire to work in a collaborative teambased environment built around ScrumltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtPreferred RequirementsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtProfessional experience with a modern front end javascript framework ie ReactFlux or AngularltligtltligtExperience building and deploying mobile apps in a modern app development framework ie Ionic Flutter or React NativeltligtltligtProfessional experience with Machine learning Data Analysis SQL query optimization and tuning MySQL preferredltligtltligtHad exposure with online marketing search engine optimization andor lead generationltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPlease Note Our primary concern is for the health and wellbeing of our employees as well as candidates Given ongoing COVID concerns new employees are being onboarded and working remotely Once we return to the office this position will be located in our office in Mountain View CAampnbspampnbspStudycom will be implementing a hybrid model that will include both inoffice and remote workltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtIn addition Studycom will be requiring all employees be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment If an accommodation is required please speak with a member of the People TeamltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtLife at StudycomltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAt Studycom youll join an Agile team making a big impact in a crossfunctional collaborative environment where team members wear different hats and regularly interact with senior leadership We get things done and move quicklyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtStudycoms team members together with our Study Studio network of instructors tutors subject matter experts video animators and editors have developed 15 million learning resources on our platform This includes microlessons videos flashcards lesson plans worksheets and more fueling 16 million hours of learning engagement a yearltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are in the heart of downtown Mountain View just a few steps from the Caltrain station And regardless if we are in the office or sheltered at home we have comprehensive health and wellness benefits We offer ongoing education and professional growth opportunities including a lifelong membership to Studycom You can also expectltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligt100 paid health vision and dental insurance for employeesltligtltligt401k with employer matchltligtltligt20  30 PTO days each year increases with tenureltligtltligt10 paid holidaysltligtltligtWork at home setup stipendltligtltligtCompanysponsored gym membershipsltligtltligtFree Caltrain PassltligtltligtTuition reimbursement and gift matching programsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtltspan classqlcursorgtltspangtStudycom provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin age veteran or disability status In addition to federal law requirements Studycom complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilitiesampnbspAdditionally qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records will be considered for the position in accordance with applicable state and local lawsltemgtltpgt
